death.attack.lantern.item: %1s was shown the Light by %2$s using %3$s
death.attack.lantern.player: %1s was shown the Light whilst fighting %2$s
item.formidulus.deer_skull.lore0: The Skull of a horrid Skeletal Beast.
item.formidulus.deer_skull.lore1: A third eye was carved into this previously ordinary deer skull.
item.formidulus.deer_skull.lore2: It was as though it spoke to us.. but we couldn't comprehend it.
